document_data.mainbody: ist of words in the [[Chondathan language]].

A.''Arauna'': "Lady"{{Cite dragon/407/Crowns and Mantles: The Ranks and Titles of Cormyr|22}}
A.''Ardess'': "Princess"{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20160331145815/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_101112-06.htm| title = So Saith Ed Oct â€“ Dec 2006| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}

D.''dael'' or ''daelin'': "a year" or "years"{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum| title      = Questions for George Krashos| author     = [[George Krashos]]| topicid    = 11779| postid     = 244513| whichpage  = 3| date       = 2008-11-14| accessdate = 2015-02-13}}

G.''Garrathen'': murderous pirate, mercenary, or outlaw raid.

R.''Rakrathen'': the word for murderous pirates, mercenaries, and outlaws.{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20190913184544/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_040506-06.htm| title = So Saith Ed Apr - Jun 2006| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
